alert.note: Alert for Mainland Dare; Tyrrell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hyde, Dare and northeastern Tyrrell Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 806 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Lake, or 16 miles northwest of Stumpy Point, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stumpy Point, Alligator, Manns Harbor, Mashoes, Manteo, East Lake and Buffalo City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
